disclaimerText: This forecast is intended to provide information on expected pollution levels in areas of significant public exposure. It may not apply in very specific locations close to unusually strong or short-lived local sources of pollution.

currentForecast.forecastSummary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Saturday 19 February to end of Monday 21 February GMT
currentForecast.forecastText: Unsettled conditions will remain throughout the weekend with rain and strong winds. A little bit brighter on Monday, but rain will persist.  <br/>Little by way of imported pollution is expected. <br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Ozone<br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>

currentForecast.forecastSummary: The forecast for tomorrow is not available yet but should be issued around midday. GMT
currentForecast.forecastText: The forecast for tomorrow is not available yet but should be issued around midday.
